participant_1.background:

I'm not much of a social media person, because I like to focus on my work and my hobbies.
i am allergic to shellfish.
My time is my most valuable possession.

I'm an animal lover who spends my free time learning more about nature and the environment.

content.text: Happy New Year! How was your weekend?
It was great! I spent it with my family and we went ice skating.
That sounds fun! I took a spin in my Toyota Land Cruiser before heading to my favorite dance club to celebrate my birthday.
That's awesome! I'm not much of a social media person, because I like to focus on my work and my hobbies.
I hear you! I need a home that has a fenced in yard so that my dog can run and play.
That's great! I'm an animal lover who spends my free time learning more about nature and the environment.
That's really cool! What's your favorite animal?
I love all animals, but I think my favorite is the elephant.
Elephants are amazing! I saw a documentary about them once and they're so smart and social.
They are! I'd love to see them in person someday.
Me too! I hope you have a great week.
